## IXform.xform() method

Returns type specific operation as transducer. Internally called by functions in this package which expect transducer args. Users don't need to call this manually.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
xform(): Transducer<A, B>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<A, B>`
